item.title: On Progressive and Efficient Verification of Digital Signatures
item.description: Elena Pagnin is currently an assistant professor at Lund University (Sweden). Here she is an active member of the CRYSPY lab (CRYptography Security and PrivacY). Her research is focused on cryptography and security, with a special interest for homomorphic cryptosystems, data authentication and user privacy. Prior to joining Lund University, Elena has been a post doctoral researcher in the crypto group at Aarhus University (Denmark). Elena completed her PhD at Chalmers (Göteborg, Sweden) in 2019. Her motto is: det är lätt att vara efterklok (it’s easy to be wise in hindsight).
